name: Confessions Amongst the Poppies
description:
Overwhelmed by a guilty conscience, Sesame considers confessing their lies, only to be interrupted by a seemingly familiar foe.





"Confessions Amongst the Poppies" is a cute, but spooky point & click side adventure inside the Aldrich Academy universe. Enjoy our fully voice acted dialogue, breathtaking backgrounds, and stunning cell shaded characters!

Mature Themes

Mentions of Death

Bats, Rats, Cats, and Spiders.
